Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.log.pruning

Class LogPruningImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.log.pruning.LogPruningImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogPruning
    public class LogPruningImpl
extends Object
implements LogPruning
    This class listens for rotations and does log pruning.

      • updateConfiguration

        private void updateConfiguration​(String pruningConf)

      • pruneLogs

        public void pruneLogs​(long upToVersion)
        Description copied from interface: LogPruning
        Prunes logs that have version less than currentVersion. This is a best effort service and there is no guarantee that any logs will be removed.
        Specified by:
        pruneLogs in interface LogPruning
        Parameters:
        upToVersion - The lowest version expected to remain after pruning completes.

      • cleanupCheckpointLogFiles

        private void cleanupCheckpointLogFiles()

      • mightHaveLogsToPrune

        public boolean mightHaveLogsToPrune​(long upToVersion)
        Description copied from interface: LogPruning
        Check if there might be a desire to prune logs. This could be used as a hint to schedule some log pruning soon, and/or increase the check pointing frequency.
        Specified by:
        mightHaveLogsToPrune in interface LogPruning
        Parameters:
        upToVersion - check up to this version.
        Returns:
        true if calling LogPruning.pruneLogs(long) now might cause log files to be deleted. Otherwise false if we are pretty sure that we don't need to prune any logs right now.

      • describeCurrentStrategy

        public String describeCurrentStrategy()
        Specified by:
        describeCurrentStrategy in interface LogPruning
        Returns:
        A textual representation of the current log pruning strategy, for logging and debugging purposes.
